 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַמָּךְ‎</span>] **noun [feminine]** exact meaning dubious (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***herd***; foreign word; Pahlavi <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ramak***</u></abbr>, New Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***herd*** of sheep, horses, etc., [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]<sup>1291</sup> [[BDB#Vullers|Vull]]<sup>ii. 52</sup>; in Late Hebrew ***mule*** born of mare and he-ass); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי הָרַמָּכִים‎</span> [[Esth.8.10|Esth 8:10]] usually ***sons of the (royal) mares***, said of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרֶכֶשׁ‎</span>.
